tool.name: COMET
tool.command:
###Default /bin/cometsc.sh bmsnkn_5x100cells 2 0.15 2 True True 5 \t ln -s $matrix /scratch/annotated_matrix.${Format} && ln -s $clustering_file /scratch/annotated_matrix_clustering.output.${Format} &&
NCLUSTER=\$(awk -F, '{ if (NR>1) print \$2 }' $clustering_file | sort | uniq | wc -l) && mkdir -p /scratch/annotated_matrix/\$NCLUSTER && ##NCLUSTER=\$(awk -F, '{ if (NR>1) print \$2 }' /scratch/annotated_matrix_clustering.output.* | sort | uniq | wc -l) &&
/bin/cometsc.sh annotated_matrix $threads $X $K $counts $skipvis \${NCLUSTER} $Separator 2>$log && mkdir -p ${html_file.files_path} && tar -zcvf zipOutput.tar.gz -C /scratch/ . 2>>$log && cp -R /scratch/* ${html_file.extra_files_path} && tree $html_file.extra_files_path -H . -T "COMET" -o $html_file

param.name: threads
param.help: number of cores to use in this machine

param.name: K
param.label: number of gene combination to be considered
param.help: Select genome index from the list

param.name: counts
param.label: Set to true if are raw count, not normalized
